name: S.O.B.
description: '''S.O.B.''' (abbreviated from '''Sabotage Organized Barbarian''') is a Japanese [[punk rock]] band formed in [[Osaka]] in 1983. Their original vocalist Yoshitomo "Tottsuan" Suzuki committed [[suicide]] in 1995. They are also considered hugely influential on [[grindcore]] bands such as [[Napalm Death]] and the genre of [[death metal]] as well as one of the mainstays of the [[thrashcore]] genre. The band have sometimes been described as grindcore, themselves.
